name: Ningyou Tsukai
overview: Ningyō Tsukai is the game that was the basis for Metal & Lace: The Battle of the Robo Babes, but the original is quite different. It is a straightforward fighting game with no power-ups or strategy elements. The player controls a female robot named Mimi and has to beat six opponents, who are supposed to be robots and beautiful young women at the same time, in three rounds each. After each successful round, a picture of the opponent in increasing state of undress is displayed. If the player loses the battle, it is instead the protagonist who gets undressed.
